page.title: 10Crazes
page.content: At our school, collections are very popular. A few years ago novelty rubbers were introduced and fanzy stickers followed; now sequins are the latest craze. Many people collect them, and the most desired is a large pearly star; the rarest is a small pearly snowflake which has only two duplicates in the school. Then there are the common ones like the small stars. Some sequins are shaped like leaves in all sizes and colours. I have them in pink, purple, orange, gold, silver, green, transparent and red. People swap whenever they can, and go around pleading for giveaways. Whether this craze will survive long I don't know, but it is a good one while it lasts.
